person.persName: Henry C. W. Hoffman (Louisville, Kentucky, merchant and tailor)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, merchant and tailor. Native of Hesse. Married to Sarah O'Neal Millburn Hoffman in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on November 8, 1845. Father of Julia Hoffman, Emma Hoffman, and Henry Hoffman. Stepfather of Mary A. Millburn and Sarah E. Millburn. Merchant in Louisville in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in Louisville in 1850. Tailor in Louisville in 1860. Tailor in Louisville in 1861.
